comments.text:
Created attachment 572260
testcase

1. Set user_pref("full-screen-api.enabled", true);
2. Load the testcase
3. Click anywhere

Result:

###!!! ASSERTION: Should have a full-screen doc when full-screen!: '!IsFullScreenDoc() || sFullScreenDoc != nsnull', file content/base/src/nsDocument.cpp, line 8487

(This is after the fixes for bug 697636 and bug 685402.)
